verses.verse: And the angel <WH4397> that talked <WH1696> with me came again <WH7725>, and woke <WH5782> me <WH376>, as a man that is wakened <WH5782> out of his sleep <WH8142>,

And said <WH559> unto me <WH7200>, What see you <WH559>? And I said, I have looked <WH7200>, and behold a lampstand <WH4501> all of gold <WH2091>, with a bowl <WH1531> upon the top <WH7218> of it <WH7651>, and his seven lamps <WH5216> on it <WH7651>, and seven pipes <WH4166> to the seven <WH7651> lamps <WH5216>, which are upon the top there <WH7218>:
And two <WH8147> olive trees <WH2132> by it <WH259>, one upon the right <WH3225> side of the bowl <WH1543>, and the other <WH259> upon the left side there <WH8040>.
So I answered <WH6030> and spoke <WH559> to the angel <WH4397> that talked <WH1696> with me <WH559>, saying, What are these <WH113>, my lord?
Then the angel <WH4397> that talked <WH1696> with me answered <WH6030> and said <WH559> unto me <WH3045>, Know you not what these be <WH559>? And I said, No <WH113>, my lord.

Then he answered <WH6030> and spoke <WH559> unto me <WH559>, saying, This is the word <WH1697> of the Lord <WH3068> unto Zerubbabel <WH2216>, saying <WH559>, Not by might <WH2428>, nor by power <WH3581>, but by my spirit <WH7307>, says <WH559> the Lord <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635>.

Who are you <WH1419>, O great mountain <WH2022>? before <WH6440> Zerubbabel <WH2216> you shall become a plain <WH4334>: and he shall bring forth <WH3318> the headstone <WH68> there with shoutings <WH8663>, crying <WH2580>, Grace, grace unto it <WH2580>.
Moreover the word <WH1697> of the Lord <WH3068> came unto me <WH559>, saying,

The hands <WH3027> of Zerubbabel <WH2216> have laid the foundation <WH3245> of this house <WH1004>; his hands <WH3027> shall also finish <WH1214> it <WH3045>; and you shall know that the Lord <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635> has sent me unto you <WH7971>.

For who has despised <WH936> the day <WH3117> of small things <WH6996>? for they shall rejoice <WH8055>, and shall see <WH7200> the plumb line <WH68> in the hand <WH3027> of Zerubbabel <WH2216> with those seven <WH7651>; they are the eyes <WH5869> of the Lord <WH3068>, which run to and forth <WH7751> through the whole earth <WH776>.
Then answered <WH6030> I <WH559>, and said unto him <WH8147>, What are these two olive trees <WH2132> upon the right <WH3225> side of the lampstand <WH4501> and upon the left side there <WH8040>?

And I answered <WH6030> again <WH8145>, and said <WH559> unto him <WH8147>, What be these two olive <WH2132> branches <WH7641> which through <WH3027> the two <WH8147> golden <WH2091> pipes <WH6804> empty <WH7324> the golden oil out of themselves <WH2091>?
And he answered <WH559> me and said <WH559>, Know <WH3045> you not what these be <WH559>? And I said, No <WH113>, my lord.
Then said <WH559> he <WH8147>, These are the two anointed <WH3323> ones <WH1121>, that stand <WH5975> by the Lord <WH113> of the whole earth <WH776>.
